subject: RE: Interactive Brokers - Social Media Influencer Opportunity - Social Trading Vlog
body:
Hi Josh,

I hope you're well. I realise I'm long overdue in getting back to you — you've reached out a few times now and I apologise for the slow response.

I'd love to pick up the conversation about working together. A lot has changed since your first email in 2022, and I think the timing is right.

Here's where things stand with Social Trading Vlog:

- 66,400+ YouTube subscribers (up significantly since we last spoke)
- 4.5 million total video views across 335 videos
- Top video: 826,000+ views ("Why Do 76% Lose Money?")
- My website socialtradingvlog.com now features interactive tools including a platform comparison tool where Interactive Brokers is already featured: socialtradingvlog.com/calculators/compare-platforms/
- The site has 180+ pages translated into 5 languages (Spanish, German, French, Portuguese, Arabic) — reaching European and Middle Eastern audiences
- Dedicated SEO-optimised content targeting long-tail trading keywords
- Nearly 10 years of documented, real-money trading experience

My audience is exactly who you'd want to reach: retail investors interested in trading platforms, many of whom are comparing options and deciding where to open accounts.

I already feature IBKR on my platform comparison tool and I'm about to publish detailed 'eToro vs Interactive Brokers' comparison content. Given that I'm expanding beyond eToro-only content, I'd like to explore your Influencer Programme properly.

Specifically, I'd be interested in discussing:
- Your CPC influencer programme rates — I understand top creators can earn significant monthly income
- Whether a hybrid model (CPC + account signups) might work better for my audience
- What support you provide for content creation and promotion

I'm available for a 30-minute introductory call at your convenience. I'm based in Malta (CET timezone) and generally flexible on timing.

Looking forward to finally connecting.

Best regards,
Tom West
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://www.youtube.com/socialtrading
